thread.title: BRIEF-Pebblebrook Hotel Trust Expects Q1 AFFO Shr $0.63 - $0.65

title: BRIEF-Pebblebrook Hotel Trust Expects Q1 AFFO Shr $0.63 - $0.65
text:
April 12, 2018 / 3:25 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Pebblebrook Hotel Trust Expects Q1 AFFO Shr $0.63 - $0.65 Reuters Staff 
April 12 (Reuters) - Pebblebrook Hotel Trust: * PROVIDES UPDATE ON FIRST QUARTER 2018 OUTLOOK 
* SEES Q1 AFFO SHR $0.63 - $0.65 * Q1 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.54 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* SEES Q1 2018 SAME-PROPERTY REVPAR GROWTH OF DOWN 0.50% TO DOWN 0.25% 
* “ENCOURAGED” BY IMPROVED BUSINESS TRAVEL DEMAND DURING Q1, WHICH WAS MUCH STRONGER THAN EXPECTED 
* POSITIVE BUSINESS TRAVEL TRENDS SEEM TO BE CONTINUING INTO Q2 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
